Nature of Silence.quote: Be still, and know that I am God. (Psalm 46:10)

Sacred Stillness.quote: Silence is the language of God, all else is poor translation. (Rumi)

Inner Quiet.quote: The quieter you become, the more you can hear. (Ram Dass)

Contemplative Space.quote: In silence and hope shall be your strength. (Isaiah 30:15)

Divine Presence.quote: Silence is not an absence but a presence. (Anne D. LeClaire)

Mystical Silence.quote: Words cannot express the joy of the soul in union through silence. (John of the Cross)

Silent Wisdom.quote: There is more wisdom in silence than in all the speech of men. (Thomas Merton)

Empty Fullness.quote: Empty yourself of everything. Let the mind become still. (Tao Te Ching 16)

Sacred Void.quote: God is the silent void where echoes dwell. (Meister Eckhart)

Silent Communion.quote: The heart speaks to God through silence. (Padre Pio)

Depths of Silence.quote: In the depth of silence, the voice of God is heard. (Mother Teresa)

Transformative Silence.quote: Silence is the sleep that nourishes wisdom. (Francis Bacon)

Divine Communication.quote: God speaks in the silence of the heart. (Mother Teresa)

Silent Revelation.quote: The eternal silence of infinite spaces. (Blaise Pascal)

Contemplative Path.quote: The path to divinity leads through the gateway of silence. (Ramana Maharshi)

Silent Knowledge.quote: What we cannot speak about we must pass over in silence. (Ludwig Wittgenstein)

Sacred Space.quote: Silence is the dwelling place of the eternal Word. (John of the Cross)

Inner Peace.quote: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without. (Buddha)

Silent Witness.quote: In silence, the witness is revealed. (Upanishads)

Divine Expression.quote: Silence is the ultimate expression of power. (Lao Tzu)

Mystical Union.quote: In silence we find union with the Divine. (Teresa of Avila)

Silent Truth.quote: Truth has no language, silence is its speech. (Ramana Maharshi)

Sacred Pause.quote: Between stimulus and response there is a space. In that space is our power. (Viktor Frankl)

Divine Listening.quote: Listen to the silence. It has so much to say. (Rumi)

Contemplative State.quote: Silence is not mere negation of speech. It is fullness, not emptiness. (Sri Aurobindo)

Silent Reality.quote: Reality manifests itself in silence. (Meister Eckhart)

Inner Sanctuary.quote: The kingdom of heaven is within you. (Luke 17:21)

Sacred Emptiness.quote: Empty yourself and let the divine fill you. (Meister Eckhart)
